Tortellini, also known as cappelletti, are ring-shaped pasta, sometimes also 
described as "navel shaped", hence their alternative name of "belly button" (
ombelico). They are typically stuffed with a mix of meat (pork loin, prosciutto) or 
cheese. Originally from the Italian region of Emilia (in particular Bologna and ... "
Fresh" packed tortellini usually have 7 weeks of shelf-life.
